Service Details: - Provides independent, affordable, second stage accommodation to women, with and without children, who demonstrate a financial need- NOW Canada offers 1, 2, and 3 bed units (some handicapped suites)- Amenities include security focused, camera monitored buildings, drug and alcohol free living, Tenant Support Worker assistance, 24 hour emergency assistance, overnight Commissionaire on-site- Laundry facilities at reduced cost, tenant activities, and access to NOW Canada programs and services
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upIf applicants have experienced addictions, a minimum of 10 months ‘clean time’ is required before applicants will be considered
